# awscc_ecr_pull_time_update_exclusion (Resource)

The ARN of the IAM principal to remove from the pull time update exclusion list.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `principal_arn` (String) The ARN of the IAM principal to remove from the pull time update exclusion list.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

In Terraform v1.12.0 and later, the [`import` block](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/import) can be used with the `identity` attribute, for example:

```terraform
import {
  to = awscc_ecr_pull_time_update_exclusion.example
  identity = {
    principal_arn = "principal_arn"
  }
}
```

### Identity Schema

#### Required

- `principal_arn` (String) The ARN of the IAM principal to remove from the pull time update exclusion list

#### Optional

- `account_id` (String) AWS Account where this resource is managed
- `region` (String) Region where this resource is managed

In Terraform v1.5.0 and later, the [`import` block](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/import) can be used with the `id` attribute, for example:

```terraform
import {
  to = awscc_ecr_pull_time_update_exclusion.example
  id = "principal_arn"
}
```

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
$ terraform import awscc_ecr_pull_time_update_exclusion.example "principal_arn"
```
